availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Walter Raleigh "Rolly" Watson, Sr. (Morgan County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Luranna Gilliam Watson in Morgan County, Kentucky, on March 11, 1850. Father of John Watson, William Watson, Raleigh Watson, Mary Watson, Martha Watson, and Martin Watson. Farmer in Morgan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Morgan County in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Morgan County in 1860.

Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 14371.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film 000839918, p. 104.
